title: ENQUIRY
content: Hey guys I am currently studying in 12th. And want to take bba in business analytics. I want to know how the college is and the crowds and especially about how the bba courses are over there. I have already applied for christ ypr and MITWPU pune. And want to apply here as bangalore is much preferred for me than pune since its too far. So somebody please reply soon. (PS:IAM FROM KANNUR)

comments.body: If you're just coming for a degree certificate, PES is decent. But the chances are less if you're coming with expectations of getting placed. Very few people get placed(Mere 5-10 people)
i see, which college do u recommend in bnglr like sju, jain or christ

Id say Christ, PES, JAIN
In this order

Not sure abt SJU

oh

btw hows the crowd like are they friendly

No. Unfortunately theyâ€™re all cannibals. They will bite if you come close and try to become friends

/s
oh shit. Btw where are you from. iam a malayali
